wallet>tokenTransferProcessModal>p1: Dear user, you are about to transfer your token <1>{{tokenName}}</1> to an external wallet. For everything to be successful and for your tokens to remain completely secure, you must use a wallet from the <3>Polygon network</3>, the same network where the token is held, otherwise your token will be lost in the process. process.
wallet>tokenTransferProcessModal>p2: For transparency purposes, we inform you that the action you are about to complete does not depend exclusively on our tokenization platform, but rather on the blockchain network in which your tokens are registered and, consequently, on the traffic system that this network operates.
wallet>tokenTransferProcessModal>p3: Therefore, your transfer will be completed as soon as the blockchain network finishes processing your tokens and this action cannot be undone under any circumstances, either manually or automatically, so that no important information regarding your assets is lost or damaged along the way.
